original_text: Some of Israel's people will remain in other countries. They will be frightened. A leaf that is blowing in the wind will cause them to run away. It will be like when an enemy is running after them. They will fall even if no enemy is running after them.
korean_text: 너희 남은 자에게는 그 원수들의 땅에서 내가 그들의 마음을 약하게 하리니 그들은 바람에 불린 잎사귀 소리에도 놀라 도망하기를 칼을 피하여 도망하듯 할 것이요 쫓는 자가 없어도 엎드러질 것이라

sentences.original_text: Some of Israel's people will remain in other countries
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성 중 일부는 다른 나라에 머물게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: A leaf that is blowing in the wind
will cause them to run away
It will be like when an enemy is running after them
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 마치 적이 그들 뒤에서 쫓아올 때와 같을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: even if no enemy is running after them
